data.eml:eml: Cephalocteinae Mulsant et Rey, 1866 (Hemiptera, Heteroptera), a subfamily of Cydnidae new for the Italian fauna: first record of Cephalocteus scarabaeoides (Fabricius, 1807) from Sardinia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fancello, Luca, Cillo, Davide, Bazzato, Erika (2016): Cephalocteinae Mulsant et Rey, 1866 (Hemiptera, Heteroptera), a subfamily of Cydnidae new for the Italian fauna: first record of Cephalocteus scarabaeoides (Fabricius, 1807) from Sardinia. Zootaxa 4067 (4): 465-468, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4067.4.4
